ing: 1 fluid ounce freshly squeezed grapefruit juice
des: "From Brad Thomas Parsons' book, Amaro (Ten Speed Press), this riff on the Lunch Box cocktail was a collaboration with a Chicago bartender. The hint of orange peel flavor in the digestif makes it perfect for breakfast, and it complements the fresh grapefruit juice."
ins: Mix amaro and grapefruit juice together in a chilled Collins glass; top with beer.
